# canOpen

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the app can open the external link account.

## Declaration

```swift
static var canOpen: Bool { get async }
```

## Discussion

Check this property before showing any user-interface controls that enable people to open the external link account.

Don’t check this property again in response to user input; instead, call [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/ExternalLinkAccount/open()] immediately.



## Linking to external accounts

- **open()**: Presents a continuation sheet that enables people to choose whether to open your app’s link to an external website for account creation or management.
